TEXT.TITLE: UNITED TECHNOLOGIES <UTX> IN JOINT PACT
TEXT.BODY:
United Technologies Corp said it joined with two other companies to form a partnership in proposing a defense system for the U.S. Army. United Technologies said it joined forces with FMC Corp <FMC> and <British Aerospace> to form <United Aerospace Defense Systems>. Together, they proposed the "Tracked Rapier" defense system to meet Army requirements for defending American divisions in Europe from low flying helicopters and tactical aircraft.
Reuter
